name: com.bandyer.cordovasampleapp
description: A sample Apache Cordova application that showcases Bandyer Mobile SDK library capabilities

scripts.android: cordova platforms rm android --nosave && cordova platforms add android --nosave && cordova run android
scripts.emulatorAndroid: cordova platforms rm android --nosave && cordova platforms add android --nosave && cordova run android --emulator
scripts.ios: cordova platforms rm ios --nosave && cordova platforms add ios --nosave && cordova run ios
scripts.updateIos: cordova platforms rm ios --nosave && cordova platforms add ios --nosave
scripts.emulatorIos: cordova platforms rm ios --nosave && cordova platforms add ios --nosave && cordova run ios --emulator

author: Bandyer S.r.l.
